entities.description: Total number of survey cases processed.
The number of cases missing data in the survey.
Code representing specific types of crimes reported in the Uniform Crime Reporting system.
Category of offense such as murder, robbery, or burglary.
The raw count of incidents for each crime type.

relationships.description: Indicates the total number of cases included in the survey.
Identifies the cases with missing data in the survey.
Associates the survey with the Uniform Crime Reporting offense codes.
Defines the specific type of crime represented by each UCR offense code.
Specifies the raw count of incidents for each crime type.
